corpus_info.name: DFCI Clinical Guidelines Corpus - POC

usage_instructions.citation_in_agent: When the agent references guideline content, include citation in format: 'According to [title] ([document_id], [source], [date]): [content]'
usage_instructions.example_citation: According to Headache Evaluation and Triage Guideline (OID-HEADACHE-001, Internal Clinical SOP, Oct 2025): Thunderclap headache requires immediate emergency evaluation.
usage_instructions.search_integration: Vertex Search will index this content. Agent should return citations with every guideline-based response.
usage_instructions.update_frequency: Review and update guidelines quarterly or when clinical protocols change

compliance_notes.phi_status: All content is synthetic. No real patient data included.
compliance_notes.disclaimer: These are synthetic guidelines for POC purposes only. Not for clinical use.
compliance_notes.validation: Clinical guidelines should be validated by medical staff before production use
compliance_notes.regulatory: HIPAA compliance required before using with real patient data
